user.title: ChargeHQ Push API Poster Configuration
user.description: Configure the ChargeHQ Push API Poster integration to send energy data to your API endpoint.

data_description.api_url: The full URL of the API endpoint to POST data to.
data_description.consumption_sensors: Select one or more sensors that measure power consumption in kW.
data_description.solar_sensors: Select one or more sensors that measure solar production in kW.
data_description.interval: How often to send data to the API (minimum 1 second).

error.invalid_url: Invalid URL. Must start with http:// or https://
error.consumption_sensors_required: At least one consumption sensor is required.
error.solar_sensors_required: At least one solar sensor is required.
error.invalid_interval: Interval must be a positive integer.
